verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for Solomon. <S%H8010><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> your judgments, <S%H4941><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> and your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to the king's <S%H4428><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>
He shall judge <S%H1777><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> with righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> and your poor <S%H6041><s%> with judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall bring <S%H5375><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> and the little hills, <S%H1389><s%> by righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

He shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> he shall save <S%H3467><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the needy, <S%H34><s%> and shall break <S%H1792><s%> in pieces the oppressor. <S%H6231><s%>
They shall fear <S%H3372><s%> you as long <S%H5973><s%> as the sun <S%H8121><s%> and moon <S%H3394><s%> endure, <S%H6440><s%> throughout all generations. <S%H1755><s%>
He shall come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> like rain <S%H4306><s%> on the mown <S%H1488><s%> grass: as showers <S%H7241><s%> that water <S%H2222><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In his days <S%H3117><s%> shall the righteous <S%H6662><s%> flourish; <S%H6524><s%> and abundance <S%H7230><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%> so <S%H5704><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> as the moon <S%H3394><s%> endures. <S%H1097><s%>
He shall have dominion <S%H7287><s%> also from sea <S%H3220><s%> to sea, <S%H3220><s%> and from the river <S%H5104><s%> to the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
They that dwell in the wilderness <S%H6728><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him; and his enemies <S%H341><s%> shall lick <S%H3897><s%> the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

The kings <S%H4428><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> and of the isles <S%H339><s%> shall bring <S%H7725><s%> presents: <S%H4503><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> and Seba <S%H5434><s%> shall offer <S%H7126><s%> gifts. <S%H814><s%>
Yes, all <S%H3605><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> shall fall <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> before him: all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him.
For he shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> when he cries; <S%H7768><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> also, and him that has no <S%H369><s%> helper. <S%H5826><s%>
He shall spare <S%H2347><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy, <S%H34><s%> and shall save <S%H3467><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the needy. <S%H34><s%>
He shall redeem <S%H1350><s%> their soul <S%H5315><s%> from deceit <S%H8496><s%> and violence: <S%H2555><s%> and precious <S%H3365><s%> shall their blood <S%H1818><s%> be in his sight. <S%H5869><s%>

And he shall live, <S%H2421><s%> and to him shall be given <S%H5414><s%> of the gold <S%H2091><s%> of Sheba: <S%H7614><s%> prayer <S%H6419><s%> also shall be made for him continually; <S%H8548><s%> and daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> shall he be praised. <S%H1288><s%>

There shall be an handful <S%H6451><s%> of corn <S%H1250><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof shall shake <S%H7493><s%> like Lebanon: <S%H3844><s%> and they of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall flourish <S%H6692><s%> like grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

His name <S%H8034><s%> shall endure <S%H1961><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> shall be continued <S%H5125><s%> as long <S%H6440><s%> as the sun: <S%H8121><s%> and men shall be blessed <S%H1288><s%> in him: all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall call <S%H833><s%> him blessed. <S%H833><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who only <S%H905><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> wondrous <S%H6381><s%> things.

And blessed <S%H1288><s%> be his glorious <S%H3519><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> and let the whole <S%H854><s%> <S%H3605><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> with his glory; <S%H3519><s%> Amen, <S%H543><s%> and Amen. <S%H543><s%>
The prayers <S%H8605><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jesse <S%H3448><s%> are ended. <S%H3615><s%>
